title: veTri vaDivElan
sahitya:
veTri vaDivElan porppadam adanaiyE uTra tuNai ena nI paTrip-pizhai manamE


anupallavi

  peTra tAi anaiya perugum avan parivai peTru uidiDavum perumidam eidiDavum


caraNam    shuTri engum ODi sukham engenru tEDi muTrum salittu vADi mOsam uTriDAmal 
maTrum evvidamum mayangit-tavikkAmal mAl marugan avanpAl bhaya bhaktiyuDan
